meanings.definition: Record (an event or occurrence) in a journal.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys journalizing her daily experiences.
meanings.sent2: I always make sure to journalize important meetings.
meanings.sent3: He found himself journalizing even the smallest details.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a busy library, constantly journalizing new information.
meanings.sent5: The detective's habit of journalizing clues helped solve the case.

meanings.definition: Engage in the activity of keeping a journal.
meanings.sent1: Every night before bed, she spends time journalizing.
meanings.sent2: Students often benefit from journalizing their thoughts and feelings.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his cat might start journalizing its adventures.
meanings.sent4: In a world of constant noise, journalizing can be a peaceful escape.
meanings.sent5: The artist found inspiration in journalizing the beauty of nature.
